column5: Hey all, just wondering  if anyone has fished wasi lake in powassan recently? Heard it was productive years ago. My family and friends will be staying on the lake this upcoming week and hoping to get into some nice sized fish and get some pics up myself.  You guys are making me jealous with the beauties you all post lol!! Any who, any info helps. Thanks Bill

There's walleye in there, but it's taken a big hit in the last decade or so.  The lake is also notorious for its large outbreak of cyanobacteria in recent years, so I wouldn't reccomend eating too many of the fish.  Good luck!
It has decent fish. Typical bass and walleye tricks will work. You'll get something! I guarantee (disclosure: I do not guarantee)
